actr.env

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component

              • actr.env.Main
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer

    public class Main
extends javax.swing.JApplet
    The class that defines main(), determines the operating system platform, and opens the application.
    Author:
    Dario Salvucci
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
